summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NIST AI RMF compliance assessment tool. Backend APIs are 100% functional. Frontend is ~95% working with minor UI/UX issues. Core assessment flow from landing page through question answering works successfully. Users can complete full 62-question assessment across 4 functions.

ui_bugs.issue: Button occasionally doesn't enable after industry selection, preventing assessment start

design_issues.issue: Found 8 industry cards instead of expected 7

console_warnings.issue: RadioGroup is changing from uncontrolled to controlled warning

passed_tests: Get Questions endpoint (62 questions across 4 functions)
Landing page loads with hero section
Submit button availability on final page
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Start Assessment button enabling logic to ensure it activates consistently after industry selection. Address RadioGroup controlled/uncontrolled warning in React components. Verify industry card count (expected 7 but found 8).
